Program Information.School: Angelo DelZotto School of Construction Management

Contact Related Information: The Angelo DelZotto School of Construction Management can be reached at 416-415-5000, ext. 6297 or by email at construction_degree@georgebrown.ca. Their office is located in room E228 with hours from 8 a.m. to 4 p.m. For college-wide information, contact George Brown's Contact Centre at 416-415-2000 (TTY 1-877-515-5559) or long distance 1-800-265-2002. The CCET Industry Liaison Office holds open houses in the autumn and spring; check their dedicated page for more information.
